project.name: PostgreSQL
project.description: The Gentoo PostgreSQL Team is responsible for delivering high-quality support for the PostgreSQL RDBMS (Relational DataBase Management System) for Gentoo Linux.

p.b: What we do, and who we are

longdescription.p: The Gentoo PostgreSQL Team looks after the packages for the PostgreSQL RDBMS. PostgreSQL is one of the most important and popular opensource RDBMS for web-based applications.
We're also onhand to provide information and support on PostgreSQL to other Gentoo developers.

project.goals: Our goal is to ensure that Gentoo provides the best environment possible for developing and running software based on PostgreSQL.

body.p: We provide regular status updates covering what the Gentoo PostgreSQL Team has accomplished since the previous status update. It is written by one of the team members and contains a quick overview of recent progress.
The following status updates are available:
The Gentoo PostgreSQL Team has not published any status updates at this time.
